rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: So while we probably don't have any antibodies — the immune system's front-line soldiers — at the ready to fight off an H5 infection, there are memory cells in our tissues that might recognize parts of a new flu virus and respond.
